import { Container, Row, Col, Card } from "react-bootstrap" const AboutPage = () => { return (

About EduSync

Empowering education through innovative technology solutions

Our Mission

EduSync is designed to bridge the gap between traditional education and modern technology. We provide a comprehensive Learning Management System that enables seamless interaction between students and instructors, fostering an environment of collaborative learning and growth.

Key Features

  • Role-based Access: Separate interfaces for students and instructors
  • Course Management: Create, organize, and manage educational content
  • Assessment Tools: Build and deploy interactive assessments
  • Progress Tracking: Monitor student performance and engagement
  • Cloud Integration: Secure, scalable, and accessible from anywhere

Technology Stack

Built with modern web technologies including React.js, Bootstrap, and integrated with Azure cloud services for optimal performance and reliability.

) } export default AboutPage
